name: Bactobot
description:
Bactobot is a short game where you explore an infected island and clean it up!

Get rid of the infection and save the animals  🐖 🦛 🐻 🦚

It is my first solo game jam, entered for MechJam3.

I included as many of the secondary themes as I could!

There isn't an end, explore as long as you like. There are stats for your progress in the pause menu.

Controls
WASD - MOVE
E - INTERACT
RIGHT MOUSE - AIM
LEFT MOUSE - SPRAY WATER
ESC - PAUSE

Secondary Jam Themes Used
Bacteria
Retro
Mushrooms
Natural Disasters
Follow the Trail
No Weapons Allowed

p.s. sorry if the mouse sensitivity is too high, I would like to add a setting for it
